ProductInfo.Features:
HD 720p (1366 x 768) LCD Panel - Provides an excellent viewing experience.
Optical Picture Control (OPC) - Deliver lifelike visuals with crystal-clear detail
Dual side-panel HDMI inputs and digital coaxial audio output - Inputs Include 2 HDMI, 1 component video, 1 composite video, 1 PC, 1 RF and 2 audio - Outputs Include coaxial digital audio and headphone
2 HDMI inputs - High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound
Stereo 10W Speaker System - Down-firing 10W (5W + 5W) stereo speakers with simulated surround sound
ProductInfo.Name: Sharp AQUOS 32 Inch 720p LED HDTV with 60Hz
